title: Bridge to Windows ssh-agent service
body: At the moment I'm using putty on Windows together with its pageant tool, and inside WSL I use https://github.com/vuori/weasel-pageant , wich simply implements a bridge from inside WSL to use the pageant running on Windows.

comments.body:
this solves your problem:
https://github.com/rupor-github/ssh-agent-wsl
